name: Queen's Custard
description: Queens Custard is gel based styling product that allows us curly girls to get a well-defined curl with a great shine.  The custard is emulsified with several organic oils and a root stimulator to add moisture, shine, and promote follicle growth.  Queens Custard is also alcohol free.  So if you're a curly girl looking for a great product at a great price, look no further!

name: Texas T Spray
description:
Provides all day hold while allowing hair freedom of movement. Natural extracts moisture, controls static and resist humidity while leaving hair vibrant and healthy. This product is great for natural as well as virgin hair styles.

Directions:
Apply 8-10 inches from hair with quick short sprays.

name: Swiss lace closure class
description:
This class is designed to help local stylist / students learn different techniques on how to apply a closure. You will learn a new service to offer your clients as well as a boost to your income. Lace closure are  great for damage hair, natural hair, thin hair or a client that doesn't want to deal with their hair. I will also teach you the correct braid pattern for a closure install and how to bleach a closure.

This class will include:
12 inch Brazilian body wave swiss lace closure (that you take home)
Needle and thread
Bleach and all the products that you will need to bleach the closure 
 What you will need:
You can also bring a model if you want to practice hands on in the class. ( optional) 

 Location for class:
2337 pass RD suite G Biloxi  MS 39531 (Unique Touch Salon)

Time and Date:
December 9th
From 9AM - 3PM

name: Brazilian Swiss Lace Closures
description:
Just as fashion trends , hair trends change and evolve every decade, year and even season.If your hair has started looking dull or lifeless you may wonder how can I look amazing without gorgeous hair?  Now here comes our best selling product ! The virgin hair lace closure is very convenient. They come in Brazilian, Peruvian an Malaysian  virgin hair, it is top quality which is the most gorgeous  hair.
 With our  closures you don't need to worry about any blending or any heat you may be using (from your hair dryer, curling iron or
 straightener) that damage your own hair easily.I think the hair closures are must have especially if you are natural or transitioning.
*Lace Closure density:130%
*The knots are in their natural state

name: Silk Base Closure
description:
Want to look as if hair is growing from your scalp? Tired of trying to blend your natural hair in with your expensive Remy weaving hair, in order to cover up tracks? Is your natural hair becoming brittle and unhealthy by over processing? Want to be able to able to comb your hair in any style, whether it is a part on the side, a part in the middle, twists in the front, or  a pony tail straight back? If you answer yes to 1 of these questions, than Our Lace Silk Base Closure is definitely for you.  

Silk Base Lace Front Closure is a Closure that is worn with a weave to give a natural looking hair line; the Silk Base material creates a scalp for this closure, and therefore can be parted and styled in any matter.

name: Malaysian swiss lace closure
description:
Hair Fetish 100% Virgin Malaysian Swiss Lace Closure is made of healthy virgin hair, which has not been processed at all. Our closures blend effortlessly with our hair extensions finishing off your style with a virtually undetectable weave.
*Lace Closure density:130%
*The knots are in their natural state

name: peruvain swiss lace closure
description:
Lace closures – or simply closures – are special hair pieces in which individual hair strands are tied onto a piece of lace.  The lace may be either beige or dark brown.  Closures are sold in various sizes, most commonly four inches wide by four inches deep.  The purpose of a closure is to allow the wearer to have a full sew in (or wig) with none of their hair left out but still have the flexibility of being able to wear a part with the appearance of scalp showing.  This is the exact same technology as a lace front or lace wig.  When the closure is attached to your braided hair (or wig) you are able to part the closure in any direction depending on how it is installed.
*Lace Closure density:130%
*The knots are in their natural state

name: Fray Check
description:
Virgin Bundled Hair will last for over a year if properly taken care of....We suggest that you seal your wefts before installing and every 4 to 6 months afterwards.

Prior to installing, You want to double check wefts and stitching for any looseness. All wefts can be double enforced by coating the weft with a transparent adhesive such as “Fray Check” to keep them more secure and to avoid any type of shedding.
Fray Check is a liquid sealant for applying to hair wefts to prevent shedding and it helps prevent wefts from becoming unraveled and maintains neat wefts. Fray Check is recommended because Virgin Hair will last for over a year if taken care of properly and all weft hair extensions will eventually start to shed regardless of which company you've purchased them from, It's better to protect your wefts and seal them to eliminate this problem. It takes 8 hours for the fray check to dry on the weft.

Before Installing Hair we recommend Co-Washing, Conditioning, Using a Leave In Conditioner, Finishing off with a Hair Serum and letting the hair Air Dry. This will start to train the hair and show you the actual texture of the hair.

name: Nylon Weaving Thread
description:
Hair Weaving Thread is used for sew-in hair extensions, making your own clip-in hair extensions, pinch braids, etc. Glides smooth through wefting and easy to thread through weave eyes. 

Weaving thread is different than regular sewing thread you'd find in a craft store. Weaving thread for hair extensions is only slightly larger in diameter than sewing thread but the tensile strength is much stronger. When you need a thread that doesn't break when applying tension, this weaving thread is the best out there



•Used to attached wefted hair extensions
•Easy to use
•Strong for long lasting hold
•1lb
•Black Color
Will last you 6 months - 1year just depending on how many weaves you do a day.

name: Virgin Hair Color
description:

Overview:

 -No Damage

 -No Peroxide

 Silk Protein - Extra shine and smoothness

name: Anti Itch serum
description:
Product Description

Salon Pro 30 Second Anti-Itch Serum - 4 oz
•Enriched with Pomegranate and Green Tea Extract
•Relieves Tight and Itchy Scalps for braids, weaves and extensions
•Soothes, Relieves and Nourishes the Scalp
Salon Pro 30 Second Anti-Itch Serum is an oil-free product which will instantly relieve dryness and soothe tightness and itching of the scalp. This serum will immediately relieve the tightness around the hairline, temples and throughout the scalp from either sew-in or bonded weaves,braids or extensions. This anti-itch serum can be used on all types of hair. This fast drying serum will not disturb your style

name: Silk Serum
description:
Silk Serum [pH5]
•High-Gloss Shine/Silkiness
•Protects from Sun Damage
•Non-Sticky
•Light-Weight
•Repairs Split Ends

 

Directions:

After shampooing and conditioning, rub a small amount of the formula into hands before applying.  On damp hair, gently work Silk Serum through the hair.  Silk Serum is great for heat protection against various styling tools. Best oil to use on virgin hair.

name: Awesome Classic care scalp Treatment
description:
Scalp Care System

Cleanses 

Prevents Hair Loss

Itchiness Relief 

Nourishes/Replenishes

Repairs Damaged Scalp

 

Directions:

Apply a small amount of Scalp Cleanser directly to scalp area.  Gently rub it in with a cotton swab.  After completely removing cleanser residue, massage a small amount of Scalp Control into the scalp area to moisturize.  The soothing formula will deeply penetrate into your skin, promoting healthy, moisturized scalp.
Great for sew ins and braids.

name: Sleeping Bonnets
description:
Stay on Satin caps never have any abrasive elastic or Velcro and always fit right for a cool comfortable night´s sleep.

 

Stays on Satin caps also prevent your cotton pillow case from drying out your hair.

 

It´s your hair - and you spend so much time making it look great - Try Stay on Satin and see the difference in the morning! 
  
 
•Prevents breakage


 
•Saves your style better than any ordinary satin
 
•No elestic and no Velcro

name: Kera Care Edge Tamer
description:
KeraCare Edge Tamer lays down wavy hair along hairlines to give edges a silky-smooth touchable texture.


• super-holding edge control
• for relaxed or natural hair
• non-greasy
• flake-free
• colorless
•flexible
